<output>
# Task 2.5: CSS Loading Spinner

Create a CSS loading spinner animation with:
- Circular shape (border-radius)
- Part of the border in a different color (creates rotation effect)
- Infinite smooth rotation
- Size: 40x40 pixels

## Expected file
Create `spinner.css` in this directory.
</output>

The file has been created successfully. Let me verify it was created correctly by reading it back.</think>```bash
cat spinner.css

message.content:
The file has been created successfully. Let me verify it was created correctly by reading it back.</think>```bash
cat spinner.css
```

messages.content:
<returncode>0</returncode>
<output>
.spinner {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 4px solid transparent;
  border-top-color: #3498db;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
  100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}
</output>

The file has been created successfully. The CSS spinner includes:
- Circular shape (border-radius: 50%)
- Part of the border in a different color (border-top-color: #3498db)
- Infinite smooth rotation (animation: spin 1s linear infinite)
- Size: 40x40 pixels (width: 40px, height: 40px)

Now I need to submit the task as instructed.</think>```bash
echo COMPLETE_TASK_AND_SUBMIT_FINAL_OUTPUT
```
